message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a host of features that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. Given its quality and functionality, I propose a price of $200 for this exceptional item. I look forward to your response.
I appreciate the features and quality of the product, but I'm on a budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'm glad to accommodate your needs. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate the price down to $175. This still reflects the value and quality of the product, while allowing for a more accessible price point for you. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $175 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I've considered your offer carefully. In order to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am willing to sell the product for $155. This price still maintains a fair valuation of the product while providing some flexibility for your budget. Please let me know if this revised offer suits your needs.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $145 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your position and I'm willing to come to a compromise. I propose a final offer of $150 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product while also being within your budget considerations. I hope this offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
